answers.answer: I also had gestational diabetes with my first pregnancy. It's not easy but trust me it's much safer to control it with diet and just make sure to stay active it will help a lot.

question: I recently found out I had gestational diabetes and it really made me sad . I feel like they're trying to put me on a diet .. I have no clue how I even got it !!!  How do you other mothers cope with this
title: gestational diabetes
